name: Power Upkins
description:
Player 1 Controls - Xbox Controller (Player on Left):
Left Stick to Move
A button to fire

Player 2 Controls - Keyboard (Player on Right):
WSAD to move
E to fire

How to play:
Shoot each other... although you can't cross the river!
If you take 5 hits, you lose! (There's no UI for this so use your brain)

We had next to no UE experience before the start of this jam. It's a miracle we even got this together.

Development Team
Lead Programmer: Lukas Gouveia
Programming: Marilyn A. Briggs
Lead Programming Consultant: Zion Aitken
Art Lead & Sound Design: Leah McDermott
Art Assistant: Dannielle G. Smith
